hero.title: Discover Authentic
hero.subtitle: Support local makers from Lithuania. Each piece tells a unique story of tradition and craftsmanship.

unique.title: Unique Handmade
unique.description: Every item is crafted with care by skilled makers, making each piece one-of-a-kind.

support.title: Support Local
support.description: Directly support talented Lithuanian makers and help preserve traditional crafts.

events.title: Events & Workshops
events.description: Join craft markets, workshops and exhibitions to meet makers and learn new skills.

kaziuko.title: Kaziuko Muge 2026
kaziuko.subtitle: Lithuania's Largest Traditional Craft Fair
kaziuko.desc: Join us at the traditional Kaziuko Fair in Vilnius, March 6-8, 2026. Meet our makers in person and discover authentic Lithuanian crafts.

becomeMakerCTA.title: Become a Maker
becomeMakerCTA.subtitle: Share your crafts with thousands of customers across Lithuania and Europe. Join our growing community of talented makers.

products.title: All Products
products.subtitle: Discover unique handcrafted items
products.noProductsInCategory: No products in this category yet
products.noProductsInCategoryDesc: We'll be adding new products soon. Check out other categories.

cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.signInRequired: Please sign in to view your cart

signIn.title: Welcome Back
signIn.subtitle: Sign in to your account to continue

makers.title: Meet Our Makers
makers.subtitle: Discover talented makers from across Lithuania

verificationNotice.title: Verification Notice
verificationNotice.desc: After Kaziuko Muge 2026 (March 6-8), we will contact makers who wish to advertise their products on our website. Unverified makers are awaiting approval confirmation.

becomeMaker.title: Are you a Lithuanian craftsperson?
becomeMaker.desc: Join our growing community of makers and share your traditional crafts with customers across Europe.

events.title: Maker Events
events.subtitle: Discover workshops, markets, and exhibitions
events.noEventsDesc: Check back later for upcoming events

footer.description: Discover unique handcrafted goods from talented makers across Lithuania.
footer.copyright: Crafts And Hands. Empowering Lithuanian craftspeople, one creation at a time.

returns.title: Returns & Refunds
returns.subtitle: We want you to love your handcrafted purchase. If something is not right, we're here to help.
returns.thirtyDayReturnsDesc: Return eligible items within 30 days of delivery
returns.easyProcessDesc: Start a return from your order history
returns.originalConditionDesc: Items must be unused and in original packaging

eligibleItems.defects: Items with manufacturing defects or damage during shipping
eligibleItems.different: Items that significantly differ from the product description

notEligibleItems.custom: Custom or personalized items made to your specifications
notEligibleItems.used: Items that have been used, worn, or altered

step1.title: Request Return
step1.desc: Go to Orders in your account and select the item to return

step2.title: Get Approval
step2.desc: Wait for return approval from the maker (usually 1-2 days)

step3.title: Ship Item
step3.desc: Pack the item safely and ship to the provided address

step4.title: Receive Refund
step4.desc: Refund processed within 5-7 days of receiving the item

handmadeNotice.title: Important: Handmade Variations
handmadeNotice.desc: Each item is handcrafted by skilled artisans, which means slight variations in color, size, or pattern are normal and part of what makes each piece unique. These natural variations are not considered defects and are not eligible for return.

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.subtitle: Hear from our makers who have grown their craft businesses
successStories.impactDesc: Together we're preserving Lithuanian craft traditions
successStories.writeYourStoryDesc: Join our community of makers and start your journey today

becomeMaker.title: Become a Maker
becomeMaker.subtitle: Join our community of talented Lithuanian makers and share your craft with customers across Europe.

kaziukoNotice.title: Kaziuko Muge 2026 Registration Open
kaziukoNotice.desc: Apply now to get verified before Lithuania's largest craft fair (March 6-8). Verified makers will be featured prominently at the event.

benefits.freeSetup: Free shop setup and product listings

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.1: Valid business registration or maker certification
requirements.3: Ability to ship within Lithuania and EU

form.craftDescriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your craft techniques, materials you use, and what makes your work unique...
form.socialMediaPlaceholder: Instagram, Facebook, or your website URL
form.motivation: Why do you want to join?
form.motivationPlaceholder: Tell us about your craft and what makes it special...
form.agreeTerms: I agree to the terms and conditions and confirm that my products are authentic Lithuanian handcrafts

success.title: Application Submitted!
success.message: Thank you for your interest in joining Crafts And Hands. Our team will review your application and contact you within 5-7 business days.
success.step1: Our team will review your application within 5-7 business days
success.step2: We may contact you for additional information or photos
success.step3: Once approved, you will receive setup instructions
